name: Honda Civic 1.8 Sport Business Edition 2012 Automatic 5 doors specs
description:
Honda Civic 1.8 Sport Business Edition is a 2012 Hatchback model with 5 speed automatic.
    
With a power of 104 KW you can reach  0-100km h in just 11,2 seconds and a maximum speed of 210 km/h with an urban consumption of 8,7 l/100km.
The engine has a capacity of 1798 cc with 4, in line cylinders and 4 valves per cylinders.

Also this model has a weight of  with coil springs front suspension and a coil springs rear suspension.

options.title: COSTS PER MONTH (4 YEARS / 15,000 KM P.J.)
